originalText.text: Beautiful friendly staff that does their job to perfection. They emphasize in hair Care as well hair styling. If you have damage hair they can nurse it back to Health!  They handle all types of hair. These ladies are the best!

text.text: Beautiful friendly staff that does their job to perfection. They emphasize in hair Care as well hair styling. If you have damage hair they can nurse it back to Health!  They handle all types of hair. These ladies are the best!

originalText.text: I love getting my natural hair washed conditioned and set here. The washer and stylist know the best products to use on my hair and the master stylist Elizabeth gives tips on maintaining my hair so my hair last for two to 3 weeks. The stylist here love doing hair and it shows in there work. I highly recommend Chanel.

text.text: I love getting my natural hair washed conditioned and set here. The stylist here love doing hair and it shows in there work. I highly recommend Chanel.

originalText.text: This is the best Dominican Hair Salon in Harlem! Elizabeth has been treating my hair for 13 years and I would not trade her for anyone in the world. She is able to blow dry my hair straight without mistreating my hair. I enjoy wearing my hair straight in the winter, and curly in the summer. Because of Elizabeth’s blowing drying technique I am able to do that. The service is pretty quick as well. I love this Salon.

originalText.text: This is the best shop in Harlem by far. Elizabeth has been doing my hair for years, her hands are magical.she can do anything you want. I definitely recommend ppl to get to the Chanel salon for a beautiful hair experience

originalText.text: Very happy and grateful for the improvement my hair has made since seeing the women here and the consisten service I receive everytime. Highly recommend Mary.
